prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a mysterious aura and elegant features.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of darkness and elegance.
Generate a character design for a ghostly creature with a whimsical personality.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique blend of black and white colors.
Make a bipedal Pokemon with a charming and slightly eerie presence.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a stylish appearance.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon with a focus on psychic abilities and mischief.

distinctive_features: Large puffy hair styled like a cloud
Unique eye shape with an enchanting appearance
Black dress-like body with white accents
Two round white ornaments on the body
Long limbs that give a graceful look
